question: How many agreements are signed between India and Canada which includes nuclear science, energy cooperation, sports, education?
explanation: India and Canada have signed six agreements in different fields including nuclear science, energy cooperation, sports, education, science and technology cooperation and information communication technology. These agreements were signed after delegation-level talks between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his visiting Canadian counterpart Justin Trudeau in New Delhi. It includes MoU on Cooperation in Sport, for Cooperation in Higher Education, for Cooperation on Intellectual Property Rights. Terms of Reference for the India-Canada Ministerial Energy Dialogue. MoU for cooperation in the Fields of Science, Technology and Innovation. Joint Declaration of Intent on Cooperation in the Field of Information Communications Technology and Electronics.
